data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Kosovska Mitrovica, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kosovska Mitrovica, Kosovo
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Kosovska Mitrovica, Kosovo that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 513 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in Kosovska Mitrovica, Kosovo, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the church in the state of Kosovska Mitrovica to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Albanian people.
Father, convict the 453 believers in Kosovska Mitrovica to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
Spirit, train the church of Kosovska Mitrovica, Kosovo to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.prayer: Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the state of Kosovska Mitrovica, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

location.name: Kosovska Mitrovica
location.cities_list: Mitrovicë, Vushtrri, Leposaviq, Zvečan, Zubin Potok
location.cities_list_w_pop: Mitrovicë (107,045), Vushtrri (30,651), Leposaviq (19,000), Zvečan (17,000), Zubin Potok (14,900)
